sitefigma.title: Personal Website Figma
sitefigma.description: In an effort to develop websites more thoughtfully, I used this iteration of my personal website as an opportunity to create a design before writing the first line of code. Prior to trying this, my designs would emerge from the coding process, but I've found this approach helps me feel more satisfied with the end product.

scrimbasetstate.title: React setState Scrimba tutorial
scrimbasetstate.description: This is a tutorial I created as a sample of my instructional style when I was planning to create a Scrimba course.
features: Explanation of how state change works in React
Example of changing state in a React app
Ability to interact with the code, per Scrimba's platform capabilities

medicaremore.title: Medicare & More Insurance Agency
medicaremore.description: Built this website from scratch using React to replace my mom's VistaPrint website, which was costing her $35/month. (Currently, this website is not being used because she has moved on from the business, so it is hosted at a free GitHub Pages domain for use in this portfolio.)
features: $12/yr custom domain she can manage on Google Domains (no longer in use)
Custom Google Maps marker for her business, shown on the Contact page using React Google Maps

rubycalculator.title: Ruby Calculator
rubycalculator.description: Created this as a way to practice Ruby and writing unit tests in RSpec
features: Operations: Addition (+), Subtraction (-), Multiplication (*), Division (/), Modulo (%), Exponentiation (^)
Each operation is covered by a basic RSpec test

birthdayhelper.title: Birthday Helper
birthdayhelper.description: Created this to automate some of the tedium associated with sending out team-signed birthday and work anniversary cards
features: CSV file upload for adding your team's names/emails/birthdays/work anniversaries
EmailJS integration for creating a templated email (requires a free account & EmailJS template setup)
Use any website to create your eCard, but use this app to send it out to your team!
